subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Without big games from Deron Williams and Joe Johnson, the Nets made Game 2 interesting because of Mirza Teletovic’s shooting and the defense on LeBron James and Dwyane Wade.
snippet: Without big games from Deron Williams and Joe Johnson, the Nets made Game 2 interesting because of Mirza Teletovic’s shooting and the defense on LeBron James and Dwyane Wade.
